title: Lead Developer
experience: experience leading a small team of developers
description: of using the latest deployment tools and DevOps practices

title: Marketing Manager
description: You should have at least 3 years experience developing and implementing successful content-rich, digital and social media campaigns (preferably in ecommerce, with outdoor sports being a huge plus). You also need to be comfortable managing tradeshow strategy and execution. Oh and an interest in cycling is a requirement!
requirements: developing and implementing successful content-rich, digital and social media campaigns (preferably in ecommerce, with outdoor sports being a huge plus)

title: Head of Performance Marketing
description: They need someone who's well-versed in leveraging paid channels to drive growth and performance to a budget in a fast-growing company. Has hands on experience of both email marketing and PPC is a bonus. It's also vital that they've had experience of managing teams and developing talent.

title: Digital Insights Manager
description: You should have at least 3 years experience setting-up behavioural analytics for ecommerce platforms and developing strategies for increasing conversion. If you've worked within outdoor, sporting goods and Internet retailer sectors that's a huge plus. Also, an interest in cycling is kind of essential!
requirements: setting-up behavioural analytics for ecommerce platforms and developing strategies for increasing conversion

title: Senior Full-Stack Software Engineer
description: Anyone applying should have at least 5+ years software engineering experience, using Node (6+), ES6 (Babel) and TypeScript. You should also be familiar with all the usual dev tools - Git, Github, PRs, Code Reviews.

title: Senior Content Marketer
description: They are looking for a hands-on Content Marketer – someone who can define and deliver their content strategy to help them acquire sellers and buyers and ensure that we build libraries of wide ranging, engaging content for use across our platform and for internal and external communications. Working across all areas of the business, this is an autonomous role and gives the individual a chance to really lead the content strategy from start to finish
experience: experience in a content marketing role, ideally in an ecommerce environment
requirements: building and delivering content strategies, aimed at user acquisition, from scratch

title: Product Manager
description: Anyone applying should have experience in a fast paced and dynamic environment, preferably a start-up. Also, they should have managed the successful launched an iOS or Android app previously.

title: Finance & Operations Assistant
description: They need bright and super-organised individual to help run the Venrex office and support our administration and finance function. Nuff' said.

title: Head of Content
description: They need someone experienced and passionate about digital content, who knows the difference between good and terrific content. They should also have experience leveraging different interactive content types and social media to enable growth. Additionally, they're looking for someone who has experience working with a team to smash targets!

title: Full-Stack Software Engineer
description: Experience with Node (Express), ES6 (Babel) and React + knowledge of Docker, AWS + DigitalOcean. Passion for UX and UI + understanding of Agile and Lean a bonus.
requirements: building large-scale web applications using Node (Express), ES6 (Babel) and React

title: HR Officer
experience: experience leading HR in a small, yet growing business
description: An exciting opportunity now exists for a Part-Time (2 or 3 days per week) HR & Recruitment Administrator to join Moteefe and take the lead in all areas of HR and Recruitment. This will be a varied role in a small, yet growing e-commerce business with offices in London, Lisbon and a number of remote workers
requirements: providing full generalist HR administrative support, including on-boarding, recruitment, payroll and appraisals

title: Head of Performance Marketing
description: This is a unique opportunity to not only lead growth efforts at a start-up, but also to have a major impact on the business moving forward. You will have a small team of Marketing generalists to lead, but 99% of your focus will be to drive users to the platform
experience: experience of working on an ecommerce platform
requirements: increasing user acquisition using testable strategies in internet marketing and social media marketing (incl. Facebook advertising)

title: Desktop Support Engineer
description: They need someone who has experience managing the set-up and maintanence of multiple technologies including Macbook, PC, WiFi, Android, iOS and the Google Suite. They also need to be a natural people person, actively seeking opportunities to help people and improve our systems and tech processes.

title: Operations Specialist
description: You must be organised, analytical and comfortable with a high degree of autonomy. You should also have experience managing the entire supply chain: raw material suppliers, assembly factories, warehousing and B2B/B2C distribution worldwide. An interest in cycling is a huge plus!
requirements: managing the entire supply chain: from raw material suppliers, to assembly factories, warehousing and B2B/B2C distribution worldwide

title: Operations Strategy Analyst
description: In short, they want someone who has worked at a top-tier consulting firm and be totally comfortable analysing large data sets - using XLS and SQL.

title: Sales & Operations Planning Manager
description: They're looking for someone with 3+ years of relevant work experience, preferably in inventory management or a broader supply management role. They should also have a successful track record of managing significant inventory budgets across a large range of SKUs. Prior experience of managing a small team is useful but not essential.
